comment: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of ` X ( a ) x. * Y ( a ) ` over all ` a ` is nonzero only when ` X = Y ` . Part of Theorem 6.5.2 of [Shapiro] p. 232. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
